name: Infestation (itch) (Chickadee Split)
description:
Welcome to the outskirts of Thereven, a city infested by tiny, feathery-winged dragons. You happen to be one of them, stealing tiny trinkets that humans probably won't miss. Unfortunately, the city's been busy lately, so you're bound to make an occasional mistake.

You can change font style and toggle dark or light mode in the game. Let me know if there are any more accessibility options I can add, or if I should change the colors!

If you find any bugs, feel free to let me know through an ask at my tumblr, https://chickadeesplit.tumblr.com/.
